section.title: p:compare
section.para: The p:compare step compares two documents for equality.
The value of the fail-if-not-equal option must be a boolean.

This step takes single documents on each of two ports and compares them. If both media types are XML media types, the comparison uses fn:deep-equal (as defined in ). In p:compare, if either media type is not an XML media type, the result is implementation-defined.

It is a dynamic error if the documents are not equal, and the value of the fail-if-not-equal option is true. If the documents are equal, or if the value of the fail-if-not-equal option is false, a c:result document is produced with contents true if the documents are equal, otherwise false.
